messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] In defense of cartoons
messages.msgSnippet: Wallace and Grommit are the best. We love them. Another favourite is Chicken Run by Nick Park also. Julie ... From:  To:
messages.messageBody:
Wallace and Grommit are the best. We love them. Another favourite is Chicken
Run by Nick Park also.

Julie
----- Original Message -----
From: <starsuncloud@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 25, 2003 6:32 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] In defense of cartoons


> In a message dated 3/24/03 9:05:31 AM Central Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> << She used to watch an English claymation thing called Wallace and
> Grommet. >>
>
> I positively LOVE Wallace and Grommet. Best claymation ever.
> My sis got me hooked on it at her house and then flying home from Alaska
they
> played a couple on the plane!! That was cool.
>
> Ren
> "The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers
are
> growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
> magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
> me....It's in every one of us."
>
> ----Frances Hodgson Burnett
>
>

messages.subject: In defense of cartoons
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/24/03 9:05:31 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/24/03 9:05:31 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< She used to watch an English claymation thing called Wallace and
Grommet. >>

I positively LOVE Wallace and Grommet. Best claymation ever.
My sis got me hooked on it at her house and then flying home from Alaska they
played a couple on the plane!! That was cool.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
